rules.text: Encountered an old man at a hovel, sleeping outside in fear of something in his cellar. Left without helping. Not my problem.
Cleared the old man's cellar without asking for payment. He had nothing but a wedding ring - I let him keep it.
Cleared the old man's cellar. Took his wedding ring as payment - his dead wife's ring, all he had left of her.
Killed a corrupted rat in the cellar - bloated, twisted, weeping green pus. Whatever caused this mutation is not natural.
The old man's reward: intel. Bandits hold the stone bridge to Millbrook. Six or more, careless at dawn. A ford lies two miles upstream.
Acquired: Gold ring with ruby. Could be sold, or kept.
